title: Am I normal?
creator_credit: New Day Films, Debra Franco and David Shepard
brief_description: A lighthearted film about male puberty. A young teenager finds answers to his questions about bodily changes such as erection, wet dreams and masturbation. Also deals with related issues such as peer group pressure, self-image, and concepts of masculinity. Includes animated sequences. A companion to Dear Diary. TEACHER PREVIEW RECOMMENDED
